name: Cedars-Sinai
0:
”Alexa, launch Cedars”
”Alexa, ask Cedars for urgent care wait times”
”Alexa, ask Cedars for wait times at Beverly Hills”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cedars
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Cedars-Sinai Health skill, Alexa can provide helpful information to you about our urgent care facilities located in Beverly Hills, Culver City, or Playa Vista. Get started and enable the skill by asking “Alexa, launch Cedars”.

Now you are ready to ask Alexa about estimated wait times, location information or hours of operation for any of our urgent care facilities. By saying “Alexa, ask Cedars about wait times”, Alexa will provide you with estimated wait times (note that wait times are subject to change). 

Additionally, by saying “Alexa, ask Cedars about urgent care information”, Alexa will provide you with location information and hours of operation.

For support questions or feedback on new features you’d like to see, please email us at webmaster@cshs.org. 

NOTE: This skill does not provide medical advice and is not a substitute for professional advice, treatment or diagnosis. Please call 911 for medical emergencies.
